xtc.lang.cpp
Class Preprocessor

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.cpp.Preprocessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stream
public class Preprocessor
extends Object
implements Stream

This class expands macros and processes header files

Version:
$Revision: 1.112 $

The token is the left operand of a token-pasting (flag).

AVOID_PASTE

public static int AVOID_PASTE
The token is not to be pasted (flag). Used to prevent incorrect pasting when the right operand is empty.

STRINGIFY_ARG

public static int STRINGIFY_ARG
The token is to be stringified (flag).

HOISTED_FUNCTION

public static int HOISTED_FUNCTION
The function has already been hoisted (flag).

NON_FUNCTION

public static int NON_FUNCTION
The function-like macro does not have a valid invocation.

UNKNOWN_DEF

public static int UNKNOWN_DEF
The macro has an unknown definition (flag).

EOI

public static int EOI
The token indicates an end-of-include (flag).

EOE

public static int EOE
The token indicates an end-of-expansion (flag). This flag is used to mark the end of a macro expansion while that expansion is recursively passed to the preprocessor.

EMPTY

public static Syntax.Layout EMPTY
An empty token. Used to replace preprocessor directives and macros that have no contents.

SPACE

public static Syntax.Layout SPACE
A space token.

AVOID_PASTE_TOKEN

public static Syntax.Layout AVOID_PASTE_TOKEN
A special token used to avoid incorrect token-pasting when the right operand is empty.

scan

public Syntax scan()

This class scans the input tokens expanding macros and returns either a Yytoken, whitespace, a directive, or a conditional.
